event.title: was put out so quickly yesterday

data.event: A house fire in Scottdale was put out so quickly yesterday that fire Chief L. "Buzz" Myers and other firefighters did not expect any victims until they found the body of an elderly homeowner in the basement.

event.title: lingered into the late morning yesterday

data.event: Because of dense fog that lingered into the late morning yesterday, many residents in the vicinity of the Marsh home reported that they smelled smoke, but none reported the fire until the smoke plumes became more visible.
